Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Racine
ShortDescription: 79th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Racine, 76th, Morgan and 79th: due to, street blockage near 79th/Racine.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: Kimball-bound Brown Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier door problem near Irving Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier door problem near Irving Park.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
